column4: hello. I have a problem with Mozilla Firefox 3 Beta 5 on Hardy Heron. I installed the wrong plugin to watch videos on youtube but now I'm unable to remove it.
check your ~/.firefox folder or wherever firefox hides its settings, you might find something deletable there
if I unnistal and install mozilla again will that help?
I doubt that, but look in that folder, and if you see something named similar to the offending plugin, remove it.
